comments:
Opening defect on behalf of another tester. We have a graphical DD editor in our product. When you have an application that contains a reference to a module within the EAR that is missing, deleting the reference appears to work but there is an error in the .log file:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2006-01-30 10:19:44.750
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception
